sect1.title: Providers
sect1.para: Providers are responsible for creating a component and giving it to the container. Injectors are providers, and there are also strictly behavior-based providers.

sect2.title: Behavior-based Providers
sect2.para: These are the providers which can wrap others and introduce new behavior.

glossdef.simpara: The Xyster\Container\Provider\Caching provider stores a reference to the component created. When the container asks this provider for the component a second time, the reference is returned instead of a new instance.
